Activity: Arrive at the office, have a cup of coffee, and read emails. Catch up on the latest news from financial sectors.
Review the Risk Management Framework to see whether the refined real-time risk management tool is in accordance with the compliance rules.
Based on the compliance rules, modify some features of the real-time risk management tool. Consult with @LEGAL-1 if necessary.
Write the final version of document including the design of stress test scenarios for the fund's portfolio, the tool refinement process and the Risk Management Framework.
Lunch break. Have lunch with @QRES-1, @QRES-2 and @SDEV-1, and discuss about our future expectations for our company.
Proofread the documentation and make sure there are no grammatical mistakes.
Take a glance at the trendy papers from Arxiv and discuss with @QRES-1 on the potential applications of the techniques for our current project.
Plan the goal for next week and check whether there are any follow-up emails. Finish the work and prepare to leave.
